title: Need a Support.
body: Hey, we are a Team with 5 Players but our Support is for the next weeks on a trip. If you want to Play in a Team and have fun at the game. You can add me in the Client but you must be Platinum maybe Gold 1. If you join the Team you dont get kicked when the Supp is comming back, you are still in the Team and we Play with you as a Team. My ingame Name is FPE Metr0x and I hope we have a great time.
